name: Journey into the Night
description:
Journey into the Night

A game by Yujie Tao

A simple game that takes you on a journey through different sceneries and moments of the day until you're lost in a lonely dark world as you find your way home. Jump your way across obstacles that lay in your path, collect items, and enjoy the journey!

Here is a link to my ArtStation page for more details on the game design: https://solspica.artstation.com/projects/NxKOrN

   Credits

Game

  • Base code by Michael Baker
  • Level Design and player design by Yujie Tao

Music/Sound (from freesound.org)

  • "calm_happy_rpgTownBackground" by GoodByte (Level 1 BGM)
  • "piano during a night with rain" by kozakhis (Level 2 BGM)
  • "BIRDS" by Julien Nicolas (Level 3 BGM)
  • "Sunset Walk" by KiluaBoy (Level 4 BGM)
  • "Distant piano" by bigmanjoe (Level 5 BGM looped)

Game Assets (from the Unity Asset Store)

  •  "FREE Skybox Enxted Shader" by BOXOPHOBIC
  • "Low Poly Dungeons Lite" by JustCreate
  • "Lowpoly Flowers" by chlyang
  • "Low Poly Forest Pack" by David Stenfors
  • "Low Poly Ground" by Juanktigre
  • "RPG Food & Drinks Pack" by Holotna
  • "RPG Poly Pack - Lite" by Gigel
  • "Simple Low Poly Nature Pack" by Neutron Cat
  • "Stylized Hand Painted Dungeon (Free)" by L2S ARTS
  • "Polygon City Pack - Environment and Interior [Free]" by Wand And Circles
